actions.text: On agreeing to the Panetta amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 389 - 29 (Roll no. 663).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Panetta amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 389 - 29 (Roll no. 663).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Panetta.

description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in House Report 116-330 to add a finding that collaborations and partnerships between institutions of higher education and Federal agencies help ensure digital data focused on coastal management issues are communicated effectively between such entities.
purpose: Amendment adds a finding that collaborations and partnerships between institutions of higher education and Federal agencies help ensure digital data focused on coastal management issues are communicated effectively between such entities.
